metadata.Description: Access to affordable and sustainable energy solutions for smallholder farmers to improve agricultural productivity and livelihoods.

level 1.Description: Energy for smallholder farmers implements building standards that promote the use of energy-saving designs and materials.
Energy for smallholder farmers funds renewable energy projects to provide sustainable energy solutions.
Energy for smallholder farmers focuses on solar energy as a key source of sustainable energy for agricultural activities.
Energy for smallholder farmers is implemented in rural areas to support agricultural activities.
Energy for smallholder farmers partners with local NGOs to implement sustainable energy projects.
Energy for smallholder farmers contributes to food security by providing reliable and sustainable energy for agricultural activities.
Energy for smallholder farmers monitors energy consumption to ensure efficient use of resources.
Energy for smallholder farmers targets energy poverty by providing access to affordable and sustainable energy solutions.
Energy for smallholder farmers addresses climate change by promoting the use of renewable energy sources.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies collaborate with research institutions to advance scientific knowledge and develop new technologies for renewable energy generation.

level 2.Subject: solar energy
level 2.Description: Solar energy implements Energy Efficiency Policy by promoting the use of energy-saving designs and materials.

level 2.Subject: solar energy
level 2.Description: Solar energy funds Research and Development to improve solar panel efficiency and develop new technologies.

level 2.Subject: energy poverty indices
level 2.Description: Energy poverty indices implement energy access programs to provide affordable and reliable energy services to underserved communities.

level 2.Subject: energy poverty indices
level 2.Description: Energy poverty indices fund renewable energy projects to increase access to clean and sustainable energy sources.

level 3.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 3.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

level 3.Subject: energy efficiency
level 3.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.

level 3.Subject: energy and health
level 3.Description: Energy and health implements building standards that promote the use of energy-saving designs and materials.
